attributes.additional_details: For all the days, and other bank holidays which have effectively been lost, give everyone a chance to have a long weekend in the middle of summer to celebrate the combined efforts in defeating the virus and allowing life to start returning to normal
attributes.background: To recognise the efforts of the public in combating coronavirus, add an extra bank holiday to the calendar

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Create a one off Bank Holiday on Monday June 21st 2021.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555205
